# budgetBuddy

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of budgetBuddy is to manage your personal budget in a user-friendly way at no cost.

## Installation

You can install the development version of budgetBuddy from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("myominnoo/budgetBuddy")
```
